original: @22b thams @23a # //
analyzed: @22b thams @23a # //
translated: The supreme nature of all things,

original: cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog / gdod nas thams cad de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog / gdod nas thams cad de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Primordially all are thus gone.

original: gnyis med don gyi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: gnyis med don gyi bdag nyid can //
translated: The nature of the meaning of nonduality,

original: kye yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: kye yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Hevajra.

original: sngon po chos nyid mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: sngon po chos nyid mi 'gyur ba //
translated: Blue is the unchanging dharmata,

original: dmar po thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: dmar po thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: Red is the uninterrupted compassion,

original: gyen brdzes 'gro ba 'dren pa ste ;
analyzed: gyen brdzes 'gro ba 'dren pa ste ;
translated: Upward-facing is the guide of beings,

original: / he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: / he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Heruka.

original: spyan gsum rnam par thar pa gsum //
analyzed: spyan gsum rnam par thar pa gsum //
translated: Three eyes are the three doors of liberation,

original: dmar ba chos nyid chags pa'i don //
analyzed: dmar ba chos nyid chags pa'i don //
translated: Red is the meaning of passion for dharmata,

original: h'um sgrogs skye ba med pa ste //
analyzed: h'um sgrogs skye ba med pa ste //
translated: Hum is the proclamation of nonarising,

original: kun gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: kun gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the chief of all.

original: g-yas na gdug 'joms rdo rje ste //
analyzed: g-yas na gdug 'joms rdo rje ste //
translated: On the right is the vajra that conquers evil,

original: g-yon na bde skyong ka p'a la //
analyzed: g-yon na bde skyong ka p'a la //
translated: On the left is the kapala that grants bliss,

original: shes rab mtshon pa kha tvam ga //
analyzed: shes rab mtshon pa kha tvam ga //
translated: The khatvanga symbolizes wisdom,

original: longs spyod rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the sambhogakaya.

original: thod pa ye shes lnga yi dngos //
analyzed: thod pa ye shes lnga yi dngos //
translated: The skull cup is the actual five wisdoms,

original: phyag rgya lnga ni rigs lnga ste //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni rigs lnga ste //
translated: The five symbolic ornaments are the five families,

original: do shal phreng ba 'du byed spangs //
analyzed: do shal phreng ba 'du byed spangs //
translated: The garland and necklace are the abandonment of compositional activity,

original: sprul sku khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sprul sku khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, nirmāṇakāya.

original: nyon mongs ma gos padma'i gdan //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma gos padma'i gdan //
translated: Unstained by afflictions, lotus seat,

original: rnam rtog mi mnga' tshangs pa'i ro //
analyzed: rnam rtog mi mnga' tshangs pa'i ro //
translated: free from concepts, Brahmā’s essence,

original: ma rig sreg pa'i nyi ma ste //
analyzed: ma rig sreg pa'i nyi ma ste //
translated: sun that burns ignorance,

original: gos med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: gos med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, naked kāya.

original: rdzogs so / //
analyzed: rdzogs so / //
translated: It is complete.
